tool_description: Validates weather data for quality issues, outliers, and missing values, applying configurable validation rules and corrections.

raw_data_timestamps.description: Array of timestamps from raw weather data

parameter_type.description: Type of weather parameter being validated

outlier_method.description: Outlier detection method: zscore, iqr, or none

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: Timestamps and values arrays must have the same length.
Invalid parameter type: Parameter type must be a recognized weather measurement.
Invalid threshold: Outlier threshold must be between 1.5 and 5.0.
Insufficient data: At least 3 data points required for validation.
usage: Provide timestamps and values arrays along with parameter type. The tool will identify quality issues and return cleaned data with validation flags.

valid_count.description: Number of valid data points after validation

cleaned_timestamps.description: Array of timestamps for valid data points

cleaned_values.description: Array of validated and cleaned measurement values

outlier_flags.description: Boolean flags indicating which original points were outliers

validation_summary.description: Summary of validation results and actions taken
